00130 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00131 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateModel() const
00132 {
00133        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00134 
00135        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00136        I_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
00137 
00138        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(objectPtr);
00139 
00140        int count = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00141        objectPtr->Clear();
00142 
00143        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00144               double x = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_X)->text().toDouble();
00145               double y = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_Y)->text().toDouble();
00146 
00147               objectPtr->InsertNode(i2d::CVector2d(x, y));
00148        }
00149 }

00161 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00162 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnInsertNode()
00163 {
00164        iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00165 
00166        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00167        if (row < 0){
00168               row = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00169 
00170               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(row + 1);
00171        }
00172        else{
00173               NodeParamsTable->insertRow(row);
00174        }
00175 
00176        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_X, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00177        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_Y, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00178        NodeParamsTable->setCurrentCell(row, 0);
00179 
00180        DoUpdateModel();
00181 }

00184 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00185 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnCopyData()
00186 {
00187        PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
00188        if (objectPtr == NULL){
00189               return;
00190        }
00191 
00192        iser::CMemoryWriteArchive archive;
00193 
00194        if (objectPtr->Serialize(archive)){
00195               QByteArray data((const char*)archive.GetBuffer(), archive.GetBufferSize());
00196 
00197               QMimeData* dataPtr = new QMimeData();
00198               dataPtr->setData(typeid (PolygonBasedModel).name(), data);
00199 
00200               QApplication::clipboard()->setMimeData(dataPtr);
00201        }
00202 }

00205 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00206 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnPasteData()
00207 {
00208        PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
00209        if (objectPtr == NULL){
00210               return;
00211        }
00212 
00213        const QMimeData* dataPtr = QApplication::clipboard()->mimeData();
00214        if (dataPtr != NULL){
00215               if (dataPtr->hasFormat(typeid (PolygonBasedModel).name())){
00216                      QByteArray data(dataPtr->data(typeid (PolygonBasedModel).name()));
00217 
00218                      iser::CMemoryReadArchive archive(data.data(), data.size());
00219 
00220                      objectPtr->Serialize(archive);
00221               }
00222        }
00223 }

00226 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00227 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnRemoveNode()
00228 {
00229        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00230        if (row >= 0){
00231               iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00232 
00233               NodeParamsTable->removeRow(row);
00234 
00235               DoUpdateModel();
00236        }
00237 }

00264 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00265 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateGui(int /*updateFlags*/)
00266 {
00267        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00268 
00269        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00270        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00271               NodeParamsTable->clearContents();
00272 
00273               int count = objectPtr->GetNodesCount();
00274               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(count);
00275 
00276               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00277                      i2d::CVector2d coord = objectPtr->GetNode(i);
00278                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetX())));
00279                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetY())));
00280               }
00281        }
00282 }

00288 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnGuiCreated()
00289 {
00290        BaseClass::OnGuiCreated();
00291 
00292        NodeParamsTable->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Stretch);
00293 
00294        CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate* columnDelegate = new CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate();
00295        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(0, columnDelegate);
00296        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(1, columnDelegate);
00297 
00298        BaseClass::CloseLineCheckBox->setHidden(true);
00299        UpdateToolsMenuButton();
00300 }

00303 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00304 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateToolsMenuButton()
00305 {
00306        BaseClass::ToolsButton->setHidden(true);
00307        i2d::CPolyline* polylinePtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolyline*>(BaseClass::GetModelPtr());
00308        i2d::CPolygon* polygonPtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolygon*>(BaseClass::GetModelPtr());
00309 
00310        if (polylinePtr != NULL || polygonPtr != NULL){
00311               BaseClass::ToolsButton->setHidden(false);
00312               if (BaseClass::ToolsButton->menu() == NULL){
00313                      BaseClass::ToolsButton->setMenu(new QMenu(BaseClass::ToolsButton));
00314                      connect(BaseClass::ToolsButton->menu(), SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)),
00315                                    this, SLOT(OnToolsButtonMenuActionTriggered(QAction*)));
00316               }
00317 
00318               QMenu& menu = *BaseClass::ToolsButton->menu();
00319               menu.clear();
00320 
00321               menu.addAction("Flip horizontally")->setData(ActionFlipHorizontally);
00322               menu.addAction("Flip vertically")->setData(ActionFlipVertically);
00323               menu.addAction("Rotate clockwise")->setData(ActionRotateClockwise);
00324               menu.addAction("Rotate counterclockwise")->setData(ActionRotateCounterclockwise);
00325               if (polylinePtr != NULL){
00326                      menu.addAction("Reverse line")->setData(ActionReverseLine);
00327               }
00328        }
00329 }

00331 
00332 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00333 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnToolsButtonMenuActionTriggered(QAction* action)
00334 {
00335        i2d::CPolygon* polygonPtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolygon*>(BaseClass::GetModelPtr());
00336        if (polygonPtr != NULL){
00337               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(polygonPtr);
00338 
00339               i2d::CVector2d center = polygonPtr->GetCenter();
00340               int count = polygonPtr->GetNodesCount();
00341 
00342               switch (action->data().toInt()){
00343                      case ActionFlipHorizontally:
00344                             for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00345                                    i2d::CVector2d node = polygonPtr->GetNode(i);
00346                                    node.SetX(center.GetX() + (center.GetX() - node.GetX()));
00347                                    polygonPtr->SetNode(i, node);
00348                             }
00349                             break;
00350 
00351                      case ActionFlipVertically:
00352                             for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00353                                    i2d::CVector2d node = polygonPtr->GetNode(i);
00354                                    node.SetY(center.GetY() + (center.GetY() - node.GetY()));
00355                                    polygonPtr->SetNode(i, node);
00356                             }
00357                             break;
00358 
00359                      case ActionRotateClockwise:
00360                      {
00361                             i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateTo00;
00362                             translateTo00.Reset(-center);
00363                             i2d::CAffineTransformation2d rotate;
00364                             rotate.Reset(i2d::CVector2d(0, 0), M_PI / 2);
00365                             i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateBackToCenter;
00366                             translateBackToCenter.Reset(center);
00367                             polygonPtr->Transform(translateTo00);
00368                             polygonPtr->Transform(rotate);
00369                             polygonPtr->Transform(translateBackToCenter);
00370                      }
00371                             break;
00372 
00373                      case ActionRotateCounterclockwise:
00374                      {
00375                             i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateTo00;
00376                             translateTo00.Reset(-center);
00377                             i2d::CAffineTransformation2d rotate;
00378                             rotate.Reset(i2d::CVector2d(0, 0), -M_PI / 2);
00379                             i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateBackToCenter;
00380                             translateBackToCenter.Reset(center);
00381                             polygonPtr->Transform(translateTo00);
00382                             polygonPtr->Transform(rotate);
00383                             polygonPtr->Transform(translateBackToCenter);
00384                      }
00385                             break;
00386 
00387                      case ActionReverseLine:
00388                             for (int i = 0; i < count / 2; i++){
00389                                    i2d::CVector2d node1 = polygonPtr->GetNode(i);
00390                                    i2d::CVector2d node2 = polygonPtr->GetNode(count - 1 - i);
00391                                    polygonPtr->SetNode(i, node2);
00392                                    polygonPtr->SetNode(count - 1 - i, node1);
00393                             }
00394                             break;
00395 
00396                      default: break;
00397               }
00398        }
00399 }
